# Welcome to Space Station 14!
Your shift has begun aboard an isolated installation in the Prospect Sector. Here, scattered outposts survive on teamwork, routine, and the grit of the crews who keep them running. Every round, you and your fellow crewmates write the story of your station through your choices, teamwork, and problem-solving.
[bold]Please follow all server rules.[/bold] If you need help or need to report an issue, contact the [color=#EB2D3A][bold]admin team[/bold][/color] through the [bold]Admin Help menu[/bold] ([italic]press [/italic][color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenAHelp"][/bold][/color]).
Detailed guides for **jobs**, **departments**, and **mechanics** can be found [textlink="here." link="SS14"/]
You can reopen this guide at any time using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenGuidebook"][/bold][/color].
-------------------------------------------------------------
## Basic Controls These are the core actions you'll use throughout normal play:
- Move with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="MoveUp"][keybind="MoveLeft"][keybind="MoveDown"][keybind="MoveRight"][/bold][/color]. Hold [color=yellow][bold][keybind="Walk"][/bold][/color] to walk.
- Examine objects and people with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ExamineEntity"][/bold][/color].
- Interact with your surroundings using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="Use"][/bold][/color].
- Open the **context menu** by hovering over something and pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="UseSecondary"][/bold][/color].
- Swap hands with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="SwapHands"][/bold][/color], and activate the currently held item with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ActivateItemInHand"][/bold][/color].
- Drop items with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="Drop"][/bold][/bold][/color] or throw them with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ThrowItemInHand"][/bold][/color].
- Pull objects using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="TryPullObject"][/bold][/color] and release them with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ReleasePulledObject"][/bold][/color].
A full list of controls can be found on the [textlink="controls" link="Controls"] page.
-------------------------------------------------------------
## Life in the Prospect Sector Space Station 14, in the context of the Prospect Sector, is one of many remote installations operating far from stable supply lines. Stations rely heavily on their crew to maintain systems, gather resources, and adapt to hazards that appear without warning.
Each shift brings: - New challenges as systems degrade or events unfold - Changing crew needs based on the tasks and threats of the moment - Opportunities to collaborate, specialize, and support your department - A highly simulated environment where small decisions ripple outward
The game is an [italic]open-source project[/italic] maintained by volunteers and receives [color=lime]frequent updates[/color]. Such rapid development means the game may occasionally be [color=#EB2D3A][bold]unstable.[/bold][/color]
[italic]If you find bugs or want to contribute to development, join the community Discord and learn how to get involved.[/italic]
